scrame.entity

Class Course

  • java.lang.Object
    • scrame.entity.Course
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Course
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Course is the class representing a course registered in the school. A course can only have one faculty member as its coordinator.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • courseName

        private java.lang.String courseName

      • courseType

        private CourseType courseType
        The type of the course. Referenced from CourseType enum.

      • tutLabGroups

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer[]> tutLabGroups
        The tutorial and lab groups of the course of type TUT and LAB. For courses of type LEC, the HashMap has only one key, "_LEC".

        A Integer array is needed to store both the current vacancy and the total size of the groups.

      • weightage

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> weightage
        The weightage of the course.

        The key refers to the component, while the String array refers to:

        • Weight of the component
        • Whether the component has any subcomponents
        • The name of its parent component

      • coordinator

        private FacultyMember coordinator
        The FacultyMember object of the course coordinator.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Course

        public Course(java.lang.String courseName,
              CourseType courseType,
              java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> vacancies,
              java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> weightage,
              FacultyMember coordinator)
       throws IllegalWeightageException,
              IllegalVacancyException
        Constructor for Course class.
        Parameters:
        courseName - name of course
        courseType - type of course
        vacancies - vacancies of type HashMap
        weightage - weightage of course components
        coordinator - coordinator of the course
        Throws:
        IllegalWeightageException - if an illegal weightage is supplied as argument
        IllegalVacancyException - if an illegal vacancy is supplied as argument

    • Method Detail

      • addGroups

        public void addGroups(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> vacancies)
               throws IllegalVacancyException
        Initializes course by registering groups. For CourseType.TUT and CourseType.LAB courses, need to check if the lecture vacancy is consistent with the total vacancy of tutorial/lab groups. The continuation of the function is dependent according to the type of the course. If the course has lectures only, then only register the lecture vacancy. Else, register each group along with their vacancies.
        Parameters:
        vacancies - HashMap of group name and number of vacancy
        Throws:
        IllegalVacancyException - if an illegal vacancy HashMap is supplied as argument

      • register

        public void register(java.lang.String groupName)
              throws IllegalCourseTypeException,
                     GroupFullException,
                     GroupNotFoundException
        Registers based on group names. This function is only for courses of type CourseType.TUT and CourseType.LAB.

        If registration is successful, decrement the vacancy for that particular group.

        Parameters:
        groupName - group name to be registered at
        Throws:
        IllegalCourseTypeException - if course type is LEC
        GroupFullException - if group is full
        GroupNotFoundException - if group name is invalid

      • register

        public void register()
              throws IllegalCourseTypeException,
                     LectureFullException
        Registers on courses only of type CourseType.LEC.

        If registration is successful, decrement the lecture vacancy.

        Throws:
        IllegalCourseTypeException - if course type is not of type LEC
        LectureFullException - if lecture is full

      • printAllGroups

        public void printAllGroups()
                    throws IllegalCourseTypeException
        Prints all groups on the course.
        Throws:
        IllegalCourseTypeException - if course type is of type LEC

      • setWeightage

        Parameters:

        Returns:
